property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of target noncreature artifact you control, except its name is Mishra's Warform and it's a 4/4 Construct artifact creature in addition to its other types. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifact creatures (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact creature you control.) Artifact creatures you control have menace. At the beginning of your end step, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact token you control. Mill two cards. {1}{W}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice two artifact tokens, Exile an artifact or creature card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact or creature that isn't a mana ability, if one or more permanents were sacrificed to activate it, you may copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Sacrificing an artifact for mana to activate an ability doesn't count.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as an artifact creature you control is attacking, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Sanwell, Avenger Ace. Whenever Sanwell becomes tapped, exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast a Vehicle or artifact creature spell from among them. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scholar of New Horizons enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {T}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Search your library for a Plains card and reveal it. If an opponent controls more lands than you, you may put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Glint Raker gets +X/+0, where X is the highest mana value among artifacts you control. Whenever Glint Raker deals combat damage to a player, you may reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put an artifact card revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target artifact creature you control. For each creature chosen this way, create a token that's a copy of it. Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: You lose X life and create X tapped Powerstone tokens. Then all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each artifact you control. (The tokens are artifacts with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the end, the war had no winner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Each artifact creature card in your graveyard has encore. Its encore cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile it and pay its mana cost: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Wreck Hunter enters the battlefield, choose target player. You create a tapped Powerstone token for each nonland card in that player's graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact offering (You may cast this spell as thought it had flash by sacrificing an artifact and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed artifact. Mana cost includes color.) Flying, double strike Creatures attacking your opponents have double strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a colorless artifact token named Scrap. {1}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on Farid. It gains menace until end of turn. • Goad target creature. • Discard a card, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Hexavus enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Hexavus: Put a flying counter on another target creature. {1}, Remove a counter from another creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hexavus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library, then exile it face down. (You may look at it any time.) {T}: Until end of turn, you may play cards you own exiled with Kayla's Music Box.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kayla wondered if Urza's repair of the music box was a display of affection, or just of skill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Machine God's Effigy enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact and it has "{T}: Add {U}." (It's not a creature.) {T}: Add {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gix ensured his most loyal followers were the first to taste Phyrexian perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, trample, lifelink {5}, Exile Scavenged Brawler from your graveyard: Choose target creature. Put four +1/+1 counters, a flying counter, a vigilance counter, a trample counter, and a lifelink counter on that creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another artifact: Reveal the top eight cards of your library. Put up to two noncreature artifact cards with total mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn. {2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rushed repairs once sent a thopter back to combat with a mechanic's still-warm lunch in the gunner's seat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Permanents you control have ward {2}. At the beginning of your end step, mill two cards, then exile a nonland card at random from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Disciple of Caelus Nin enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player chooses up to five permanents they control. All permanents other than Disciple of Caelus Nin that weren't chosen this way phase out. Permanents can't phase in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I - Create two tapped Powerstone tokens. II - Choose two target players. Until your next turn, each creature they control attacks the other chosen player each combat if able. III - The Brothers' War deals X damage to any target and X damage to any other target, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, trample Whenever Sardian Avenger attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts your opponents control. Whenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Sardian Avenger deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control and land cards in your library are basic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holiness is not found in a druid's words, or even the rituals of Titania's court. It is found here, in the mud, where Gaea bares her soul, unshackled by ceremony."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play Forests from your graveyard. Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/3 green Elemental creature token. Whenever an Elemental you control dies, you may mill three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4. Whenever you gain life, each Advisor, Artificer, and Monk you control gains vigilance and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained. Tap three untapped Advisors, Artificers, and/or Monks you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Metalcraft - {T}: Add {C} for each Urza's land you control. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza eventually came to understand Tocasia's lessons on clarity of purpose. Perfection became his goal, and all other matters fell away in its pursuit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of target noncreature artifact you control, except its name is Mishra's Warform and it's a 4/4 Construct artifact creature in addition to its other types. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of the Ruins enters the battlefield, exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments. Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Other artifacts you control have ward {2}. Bronze Guardian's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metalcraft - Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking artifact creatures you control. Whenever one or more artifact creatures enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures, then create an X/X colorless Phyrexian Horror artifact creature token, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as one drop of the oil exists, the joyous work continues.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve." - Ghalma the Shaper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Exile all nonland permanents that aren't legendary.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza poured his love, his grief, and his hatred into the Sylex, and the Multiverse shook.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only Kiora would dare steal the weapon of a god. Only Kiora could have succeeded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, mill four cards. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature or enchantment. {2}{U}: Untap Ethersworn Adjudicator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Esper mages devised their weapons to be so devastating that war seemed unnecessary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Filigree Attendant's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The perfect assistant is one that's responsive, dexterous, and capable of reaching all the high shelves." - Coruk, Esper artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Mnemonic Sphere: Draw two cards. Channel - {U}, Discard Mnemonic Sphere: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the Imperials search our laboratories. Will they think to look for secrets in a pretty bauble?" - Emire, director of the Saiba Futurists

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest mana value among artifacts you control. You may put an artifact card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt . . . incredible." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control have hexproof. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control the artifact with the highest mana value or tied for the highest mana value, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as you control four or more artifacts, Shimmer Dragon has hexproof. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The indigo dragon gladly traded a bit of its hoard for everlasting moonlight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is the universal currency of the Multiverse. It is power. It is freedom. It is possibility itself."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts Flying When Thought Monitor enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It roams the skies over the Quicksilver Sea, alert for any hint of aberrant thought.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - Whenever Vedalken Humiliator attacks, if you control three or more artifacts, creatures your opponents control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact creatures you control have flying. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target noncreature artifact you control become a 0/0 artifact creature. If you do, put four +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Armix, Filigree Thrasher attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, target creature defending player controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control plus the number of artifact cards in your graveyard. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. {T}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Create a Treasure token. {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. {3}{B}: Untap Fain, the Broker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise." - Skyclave inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) {X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with mana value X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player mills X cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Flying At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card. {1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 3 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to Marionette Master's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Audacious Reshapers deals damage to you equal to the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R}. As Cursed Mirror enters the battlefield, you may have it become a copy of any creature on the battlefield until end of turn, except it has haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste {1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its flight sets the sky itself on fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Target artifact gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to joke that he had been exiled for being too smart. Now I know why he never laughed." - Glissa Sunseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0. Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control have haste. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 blue Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token. Then you may choose a token you control. If you do, each other token you control becomes a copy of that token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Chrome Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. If you put an artifact card into your hand this way, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Prismari students dance in the tension between passion and perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a historic spell, draw a card. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As she took the wheel of the Weatherlight for the first time in a millennium, Jhoira knew she'd been right to restore the ship. Anything was possible now.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more artifacts you control leave the battlefield during your turn, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn. {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Oni-Cult Anvil deals 1 damage to each opponent. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Silas Renn, Seeker Adept deals combat damage to a player, choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our secrets lie in the desert beyond the Hekma. But finding them will not be your challenge; living with the knowledge will be." - Samut, to Basri

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them the same mercy they showed to Kroog." - Gyvan, thopter pilot

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law - strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foundries of Kaladesh run like clockwork under the supervision of their formidable overseers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Indestructible Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Darksteel Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its predecessors were etched with the wisdom of ancients; its own etchings bear warnings of a future fraught with war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?" - Mairsil, the Pretender

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned." "And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our glorious infection has taken hold." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn. {8}, {T}, Sacrifice Idol of Oblivion: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arise, great one, and cleanse the world of our enemies!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Target nonland permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Weaponized jewelry has a long and respected history." - Ervos Trax

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. {3}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. {4}, {T}: Copy target permanent spell you control. (The copy becomes a token.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of noncreature artifacts you control. Sacrifice two artifacts: Return Metalwork Colossus from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?" - Jhoira, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faces of Geth's corpse-dredgers are disturbingly similar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens. Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard. When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sigil holds different meanings depending on its form and presentation. While some wear it as a sign of status, others wear it as a sign of debt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all graveyards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Servo Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate prizes innovation when it is dependable and replicable.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent. When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact." - Sargis Haz, artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nobody knew what the relic did, only that it was growing louder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared." - Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infinite possibilities contained in a finite space.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life. {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Traxos, Scourge of Kroog enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a historic spell, untap Traxos. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Halcyon, floating capital of the Thran. The once shining city in the clouds now lies ruined on the desert floor." - Fall of the Thran

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes." - Tullus of Palandius

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped. When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: History has buried its treasures deep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's said the spirits of the drowned dead hang their lights from the shattered figureheads.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Murky Otarian tides hide the forgotten treacheries of the Phyrexian war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Drossforge Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. Indestructible {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path to ruin is forged in pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." - Pulan, Bant orchardist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goldmire Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. Indestructible {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path to glory is forged in ambition.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Molten blood runs through the ruins of the forge city of Phoenon, a still-beating heart whose body rotted centuries ago." - Fall of the Thran

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mistvault Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. Indestructible {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path to knowledge is forged in hunger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Razortide Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. Indestructible {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path to unity is forged in understanding.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U}. If you played a land this turn, add {B} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world." - Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Full of immense beauty and power, the falls at Orleason inspired the empire's greatest dreamers." - Fall of the Thran

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The carnage of conflicts long past still stains the Otarian soil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silverbluff Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. Indestructible {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path to genius is forged in creativity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Remote but always watching, the soaring city of Otawara moves over Kamigawa with a purpose that few understand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) Smoldering Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The continent of Guul Draz is a geothermal swampland reeking of heat and decay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the continent of Tazeem, rushing waters plunge through narrow canyons into mist-cloaked lakes.

property.value: Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Koilos, the Thran prison-city, built to house their outcasts and dissidents. It was here that Phyrexia's influence first festered." - Fall of the Thran
